name: To do List with Labels and Tags
description:
Weekly to do list with labels.

  • Each task is created with components for easy customisation.
  • Tasks can be quickly marked done by toggling instance state
  • Card height will automatically adjust to height of text


How I use this list

  • I use the eng/pm/team labels on the side to remind me which of my daily tasks need to be sync ups or meetings with eng/pm/team
  • I can toggle tasks as ‘done’ because each task is a component with a ‘done’ variant
  • When working with others in a team, I keep track of what I’ve done with the task card that has a circle icon on the right. Task cards with (W) will be for tasks that I've completed.
  • The event cards help me keep track of relevant design events in the day from different calendars


Would love to hear how you've used it or customised it to your own use cases, and what you like about it! ❤️
